channel.title: madhead's wiki on Everything I know
channel.description: Recent content in madhead's wiki on Everything I know

item.title: ‚¨õ Code of Practice
item.description: Wear the uniform Think long term (like 30 years from now) Build stories and languages, not things Create your own universe (or join ours) Collect samples Be a sample for somebody else Look for loyalty, not for a skill set Do not build utilitarian products. However, use them as a medium to express yourself Do not exploit introverts ‚Äî doesn‚Äôt work long term. Learn to be an introvert yourself

item.title: üî∫ CAP
item.description: Links You Can‚Äôt Sacrifice Partition Tolerance [EN üá∫üá∏] [Oct 2010] Of the CAP theorem‚Äôs Consistency, Availability, and Partition Tolerance, Partition Tolerance is mandatory in distributed systems. You cannot not choose it. Instead of CAP, you should think about your availability in terms of yield (~availability, percent of requests answered successfully) and harvest (~consistency, percent of required data actually included in the responses) and which of these two your system will sacrifice when failures happen.

item.title: ‚úçÔ∏è Prescriptions
item.description: If one needs a prescription for a medicine in Poland, the fastest way would be one of these special services. Prices vary, but one could expect them to be 50‚Äì100 PLN. There are no guarantees, as well, but in case of a refusal refunds are available. https://receptozaur.pl (cheaper, full refunds) https://receptomat.pl (pricier, with 10 PLN non-refundable fee)

item.title: üë¥üèΩ PPK
item.description: Glossary PPK Pracownicze Plany Kapita≈Çowe, employee capital plans. IKE Indywidualne Konto Emerytalne. TFI Towarzystwa Funduszy Inwestycyjnych, investment fund company. PTE Powszechne Towarzystwo Emerytalne, universal pension company. PrTE Pracownicze Towarzystwo Emerytalne, employee pension company. PPE Pracowniczy Program Emerytalny, employee pension plan. General Information PPK is a universal savings system for employees. The main objective of PPK is to provide the participant with additional money, which can be used after the age of 60, and in exceptional situations earlier.
